casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2010-1870. Cincinnati Ins. Co. v. Oblates of St. Francis de Sales, Inc.

Lucas App. No. L-09-1146, 2010-Ohio-4382. Reported at 127 Ohio St.3d 1546, 2011-Ohio-647, 941 N.E.2d 803. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Pfeifer, J., dissents. Lanzinger, J., not participating.
